```pddl
[
  '(:action unroll_tape
    :parameters (?p - agent ?loc - location ?tape - tape)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (inventory ?p ?tape) (not (is_unrolled ?tape)))
    :effect (is_unrolled ?tape))',

  '(:action unroll
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?loc - location ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?loc) (inventory ?actor ?item) (not (is_unrolled ?item)))
    :effect (is_unrolled ?item))',

  '(:action measure
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?object - object ?attribute - attribute ?value - value)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (inventory ?agent ?object) (has_attribute ?object ?attribute) (measureable ?attribute ?value))
    :effect (and (measured ?object ?attribute ?value) (not (has_attribute ?object ?attribute))))',

  '(:action fold
    :parameters (?p - agent ?loc - location ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (inventory ?p ?item) (or (is_cut ?item) (is_folded ?item)))
    :effect (is_folded ?item))',

  '(:action tape
    :parameters (?p - agent ?loc - location ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?tape - tape)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (inventory ?p ?tape) (inventory ?p ?item1) (inventory ?p ?item2) (is_smooth ?item1) (is_smooth ?item2))
    :effect (is_joined ?item1 ?item2))',

  '(:action complete
    :parameters (?p - agent ?loc - location ?item - object ?length - length ?item2 - object)
    :precondition (and 
      (at ?p ?loc)
      (inventory ?p ?item)
      (or 
        (not (is_unrolled ?item))
        (and (is_unrolled ?item) (not (is_cut ?item ?length)))
        (and (is_cut ?item ?length) (not (is_folded_halfway ?item)))
        (and (is_folded_halfway ?item) (not (is_folded_completely ?item)))
        (and (is_folded_completely ?item) (not (are_ends_joined ?item ?item2)))
        (and (are_ends_joined ?item ?item2) (not (is_completed ?item)))
      )
    )
    :effect (and 
      (or 
        (is_unrolled ?item)
        (is_cut ?item ?length)
        (is_folded_halfway ?item)
        (is_folded_completely ?item)
        (are_ends_joined ?item ?item2)
        (is_completed ?item)
      )))'
]
```
